select count(*) from ecm_user
and pk_user_id like CONCAT('%',#{userId},'%')
and username like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
and mobile like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
and is_valid = #{isValid}
and user_logo_status = #{userLogoStatus}
and roles like CONCAT('%',#{roles},'%')

select pk_user_id, `password`, email_uuid, is_valid, username, mobile, email, `count`, last_login_time, card_code, last_check_mail, roles, user_logo_url, user_logo_status , sub_total_flow , sub_used_flow ,sub_app_id from ecm_user inner join ecm_downlink_flow on fk_user_id = pk_user_id
and pk_user_id like CONCAT('%',#{userId},'%')
and username like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
and mobile like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
limit #{start},#{limit}
